dict.acceptation: 营救，救援，使免遭损失；[法律] 非法劫回；
营救，救援；营救[救援]行动；

sent.orig: Legitimate act of rescue and act of rescue exempt from responsibility have different penal effect.
sent.trans: 合法化的和免责的紧急避险具有不同的刑法效果。

sent.orig: The message is not anticipate rescue, but to be prepared to rescue oneself.
sent.trans: 不要期待救援，而要做好自救的准备。

sent.orig: Carrying out emergency rescue training for enterprises and emergency rescue teams.
sent.trans: 对各类企业和应急救援队伍开展应急救援能力培训。

sent.orig: The United States military has been helping rescue rescue people and transport emergency supplies by helicopter.
sent.trans: 美国军队一直在通过直升机救人和运输紧急物资。

sent.orig: Including Rescue rope, karabiners, Descender, Sling, Rope protectors, Red rescue bag.
sent.trans: 包括救援绳，安全钩，下降器，吊带，绳护套和红色储存包。
